# extrusionDepth

**Instance Property**

The extent of the extruded text in the z-axis direction. Animatable.

## Declaration

```swift
var extrusionDepth: CGFloat { get set }
```

## Discussion

The geometry is centered along the z-axis of its local coordinate space. For example, if its extrusion depth is is `1.0`, the geometry extends from `-0.5` to `0.5` along the z-axis.

An extrusion depth of `0.0` (the default) creates a flat, one-sided shape.

You can animate changes to this property’s value. See [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/animating-scenekit-content].

## Managing the Text’s 3D Representation

- **flatness**: A number that determines the accuracy or smoothness of the text geometry.
- **chamferRadius**: The width or depth of each chamfered edge. Animatable.
- **chamferProfile**: A path that determines the cross-sectional contour of each chamfered edge.
